_source.short_desc: Powerful cross-platform backup and disaster recovery that leverages the public cloud to enable a comprehensive data protection strategy
_source.long_desc:
MSP360 Managed Backup. Simple. Reliable.

MSP360 Managed Backup is an easy-to-use backup solution with centralized management, monitoring, and reporting. The platform is natively integrated with AWS, Wasabi, Backblaze B2, and Microsoft Azure to enable best-in-class data protection for Windows, Linux, macOS, VMware, Hyper-V, Microsoft 365, and Google Workspace.
_source.target_audience: Managed Service Providers, IT Service Providers, VARs, System Integrators

category_features.name: Backup and Recovery
category_features.definition: Create backups and provide methods to recover deleted/lost data

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Issue Management
category_features.definition: Identify and respond to unexpected problems or failures (ie. "negative events")

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Automatically approve patches as they become available

category_features.name: Automatic Patch Deployment
category_features.definition: Set a time to deploy patches automatically

category_features.name: Automatic Scans
category_features.definition: Setup recurring or automatic scans

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Customization
category_features.definition: Create customized code changes and patches

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Network Wide Management
category_features.definition: The ability to manage all patches within a network

category_features.name: Patch Prioritization
category_features.definition: Determine which patches should receive immediate attention

category_features.name: Patch Testing
category_features.definition: Test patches before deployment to mitigate security risks

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Vulnerability Scanning
category_features.definition: Discover patch statuses and vulnerabilities

category_features.name: Deployment Management
category_features.definition: Manage the processes involved when making the application ready for use

category_features.name: For MSPs
category_features.definition: Application is geared towards use by managed services providers

category_features.name: IT Asset Management
category_features.definition: Inventories and tracks changes to hardware and software configurations

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Network Monitoring
category_features.definition: Tracks and makes accessible data on the health of servers and other network components

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Real-time Alerts
category_features.definition: Receive notification of issues as soon as they occur

category_features.name: Remediation Management
category_features.definition: Identify and orchestrate execution of actions needed to restore systems to optimal conditions

related_products.short_desc: MSP mode in Freshservice helps you provide enhanced IT support for multiple clients from a single platform.
related_products.features: Freshservice is an intelligent, right-sized ITSM solution that delivers exceptional employee experiences with an intuitive, scalable, no-code solution. With its state-of-the-art AI and ML capabilities, Freshservice helps organizations ease an IT agents workload and improve their productivity by automating mundane tasks. In addition to its AI capabilities, Freshservice is flexible and scalable enough to be used by both: companies relying on legacy systems and modern enterprises.

related_products.short_desc: Simplified endpoint management for desktops, servers, and mobile laptops.
related_products.features: GoTo Central is a powerful, easy-to-use endpoint management solution enabling IT professionals to effectively monitor, manage, and secure their endpoint infrastructure. Whether you have remote employees or endpoints scattered across the globe, GoTo Central provides IT organizations with the speed, flexibility, and insight needed to increase productivity, reduce IT costs, and mitigate risk.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
related_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

related_products.short_desc: MSP friendly DNS Based Web content filter that blocks malware, ransomware and phishing attempts while providing web content control
related_products.features:
MSP Web Filtering and Security Solution. Advanced, real time Malware blocking.
DNS Based Web content filter and web security layer that blocks malware, ransomware and phishing attempts as well as providing web content control. We filter over 1/2 a billion DNS requests every day, identify 100,000 malware iterations a day and have over 1,500 MSP's. Cloud and gateway versions available. Improve your cybersecurity now.
Try a free Trial of WebTitan today, support included.

related_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one MSP Software built for MSPs and IT Professionals. Includes everything you need. Try for Free Today!
related_products.features: Atera offers an all-in-one MSP Software built for MSPs and IT Professionals. Atera includes everything you need in one integrated solution: remote monitoring and management (RMM), PSA, remote access, patch management, billing, reports, network discovery and so much more! Atera's disruptive pricing model allows users to pay a fixed and transparent monthly cost that includes unlimited devices and endpoints. Try Atera today for free. No contracts or credit card needed.

related_products.short_desc: 2 out to 3 top MSPs choose ConnectWise for greater accountability, operational efficiency & profitability. See why. View the demo!
related_products.features: ConnectWise is the leading business operating system for IT service providers & consultants, MSPs, integrators & developers. Over 28 years, ConnectWise has become a standard in the IT industry with over 300 API integration partners. As a result, 2 out to 3 top MSPs choose ConnectWise for greater accountability, operational efficiency & profitability. View the demo and learn how you can join them.

related_products.short_desc: MSPs like you get more cost savings, business growth, and customer satisfaction with Kaseya's powerful RMM software. Get a demo today.
related_products.features: With Kaseya VSA, you get more from your RMM. MSPs like you that are torn between cost-savings, growth, and customer satisfaction in today's economic climate are moving forward with confidence knowing their most essential RMM functions are optimized while reaping the benefits of Kaseya's industry leading MSP-enablement offerings. Ready to power your MSP services? Get a demo today.

related_products.short_desc: JumpCloud's Directory-as-a-Service securely manages and connects your users to their systems, applications, files, and networks.
related_products.features: JumpCloud's cloud directory enables managed service providers (MSPs), internal IT departments, VARs/distributors, and DevOps teams to securely and easily enable access to any IT resource, from anywhere. With JumpCloud, you can centrally manage identities, access, and devices whether your clients work on macOS, Windows, or Linux systems. Plus, visualize and manage your clients from a single Multi-Tenant Portal - no more logging in and out of software instances.

related_products.short_desc: Pulseway is a simple, yet powerful RMM platform used by over 6,000 MSPs worldwide. An MSP Software designed to transform your business.
related_products.features: Used by over 6,000 MSPs world-wide, Pulseway a simple, yet powerful RMM platform with advanced automation, out-of-the-box patching engine, network discovery and reporting. Pulseway All-in-One MSP software delivers instant productivity, increased customer satisfaction, and additional revenue opportunities.

related_products.short_desc: Manage & monitor all your customers? Hyper-V & VMware backups from a single cloud console, on a monthly subscription. 30-Day free trial
related_products.features: Altaro VM Backup for MSPs is a monthly subscription program, built specifically for MSPs. It allows you to provide your customers with reliable virtual backups, recovery and replication. Pay per VM per month, with flexibility to set your own pricing model for your customers. You will get full access to all features across all customers, including Replication, CDP, Instant Boot, Deduplication, as well as the ability to manage all backups from one central console. Try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: NinjaRMM is NinjaOne's powerful easy-to-use RMM, offering all the features, flexibility, and power MSPs need.
related_products.features: NinjaRMM is NinjaOne's powerful easy-to-use RMM, offering all the features, flexibility, and power MSPs need in a fast-to-setup, easier-to-use package. Our centralized, policy-based management approach puts automation at the center of your endpoint management strategy while Ninja's modern UI drives radical improvements to technician efficiency. With no implementation fees, simple per-agent pricing, and the best-rated support, NinjaRMM is built for the way MSPs work.

similar_products.features: N-able N-sight RMM (formerly N-able RMM) is a complete remote monitoring and management platform designed to make managing, maintaining, and protecting IT assets easy for IT service providers, MSPs, and in-house IT professionals. From a single web-based dashboard, you get fast access and support tools, robust remote monitoring and management with patch management and drag & drop automation included, and ticketing & billing. N-able N-sight RMM is built for those who need to do more and earn more

similar_products.short_desc: Powered by automated detection and 24/7 human threat hunting, Huntress tracks down threats that evade other solutions.
similar_products.features: Huntress uses automated detection and 24/7 human threat hunting to track down threats that bypass most antivirus solutions, including persistent footholds which are often used by attackers to gain backdoor access into a network - undetected. Other services and features include Ransomware Canary file alerts, Managed Antivirus for Microsoft Defender, Host Isolation to stop the spread of critical attacks, External Recon for attack surface reduction, and Partner Enablement resources and support.

similar_products.features: HaloPSA is a single, all-inclusive solution, designed for MSPs and service providers. HaloPSA gives you the power to manage your entire company with powerful out-of-the-box functionality. similar_products.short_desc: Automate is the only RMM platform in the industry developed by an MSP for MSPs to automate IT service delivery & drive revenue growth.
similar_products.features: ConnectWise Automate, formerly LabTech, is a leading global provider of remote monitoring, management (RMM), and automation software for today's IT service providers. Whether you're an experienced IT managed service provider (MSP) or an hourly rate one-man shop, Automate can help you significantly improve your operational productivity and efficiency by leveraging the power of IT automation. Take your free tour today!

Over 28 years, ConnectWise has become a standard in the IT industry with over 300 API integration partners. As a result, 2 out to 3 top MSPs choose ConnectWise for greater accountability, operational efficiency & profitability. View the demo and learn how you can join them.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate Your Business. Simplfy Your Life. Tigerpaw is a complete end-to-end business automation solution.
similar_products.features: Our unique, all-in-one solution combines the best features of a PSA tools solution, a robust CRM solution and a BPM software solution into a platform that provides complete visibility, coordination and control of all aspects of your business. With Tigerpaw One, every employee -- from the CEO to the field technician, and from the head of sales and marketing to the customer service representative -- will have the tools and resources he or she needs to be more productive.

similar_products.short_desc: Syncro is the integrated business platform for running a profitable MSP. Enjoy PSA, RMM and remote access in one affordable package.
similar_products.features:
Syncro is the integrated business platform for running a profitable MSP. Enjoy PSA, RMM and remote access in one affordable package.

PLUS! Integrations to 50+ MSP and business tools you also love and use amp your efficiency even more.

Syncro pricing is refreshingly simple-one flat fee for all RMM, PSA, and remote access features. Unlimited endpoints, no contracts, no minimums. 

Onboarding with Syncro is fast and free. Our bulk agent installer can have you up and running on all

similar_products.short_desc: ConnectWise RMM is a new solution built upon the ConnectWise Platform that combines: out-of-the-box automation with robust automation.
similar_products.features: ConnectWise RMM is a new remote monitoring and management solution built from the ground up to reinvent how MSPs adopt, interact with, and manage their RMM solution. ConnectWise RMM is built upon the infinitely scalable ConnectWise Platform that combines the best of the both worlds: out-of-the-box automation coupled with the robust automation needed to deliver customized services to your customers.

similar_products.short_desc: Enables Managed Service Providers & IT Consultants to offer backup & recovery services for M365 mailboxes, Teams, OneDrive, SharePoint.
similar_products.features: This monthly subscription program enables Managed Service Providers, IT resellers and IT consultants to provide backup and recovery services for Microsoft/Office 365 mailboxes, Teams, files stored within OneDrive and SharePoint, and Windows-based endpoints. MSPs can easily take backups and manage them through a convenient, multi-tenant, cloud-based console. M365 backups are automatically saved to our secure datacenters. MSPs simply pay per user, per month. Includes 24/7 support.

similar_products.short_desc: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to make managing complex IT networks simple.
similar_products.features: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to help managed services providers handle complex networks with ease. With extensive automation and in-depth configurability options, security features like antivirus, endpoint detection and response, patch management, and integrated backup, N-central is built to help MSP businesses efficiently manage intricate networks from one easy-to-use platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Managing your clients' networks is easy, automated, and more profitable with Auvik's network monitoring & management software.
similar_products.features: Auvik makes network management more profitable for MSPs. Monitor and manage an unlimited number of sites from one parent account, get an at-a-glance NOC view from a global dashboard, and integrate with popular PSAs and RMMs to automate and streamline the way you manage client networks. It's compatible with over 15,000 devices from more than 700 vendors, and comes with 50+ pre-configured and customizable alerts.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Service software helps IT service providers to sell, implement, deliver and bill their services by automating field services and technician management. IT Service solutions are often ITIL compatible, flexible and customizable and are designed to allow organizations to focus on delivering service while at the same time reducing their overhead. For related software solutions see Service Dispatch software and Field Service Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top ITSM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of ITSM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: ITSM software, also known as Information Technology Service Management software, focuses on management of internal and external IT support. These applications guide IT organizations through the planning, design, development, delivery, and support of their services. ITSM solutions encompass such areas as Help Desk and IT Service.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Monitoring and Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Monitoring and Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Monitoring and Management or RMM software is widely used by managed services providers to perform monitoring, maintenance and troubleshooting for their clients' IT systems.

_source.short_desc: Powerful cross-platform backup and disaster recovery that leverages the public cloud to enable a comprehensive data protection strategy
_source.long_desc:
MSP360 Managed Backup. Simple. Reliable.

MSP360 Managed Backup is an easy-to-use backup solution with centralized management, monitoring, and reporting. The platform is natively integrated with AWS, Wasabi, Backblaze B2, and Microsoft Azure to enable best-in-class data protection for Windows, Linux, macOS, VMware, Hyper-V, Microsoft 365, and Google Workspace.
_source.target_audience: Managed Service Providers, IT Service Providers, VARs, System Integrators

category_features.name: Backup Log
category_features.definition: Records the events that occur during a backup process

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Cloud Backup
category_features.definition: Allows back up of files to cloud storage like Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: Copy only the new data that has been changed or created since the previous backup

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Bare-Metal Restore
category_features.definition: Restore the physical Window Servers, Desktops and Laptops from the scratch

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Continuous Backup
category_features.definition: Backup of computer data  automatically saving a copy of every change made to that data

category_features.name: Differential Backup
category_features.definition: Cumulative backup of all changes made since the last full backup

category_features.name: Disaster Recovery
category_features.definition: Plan and implement business continuity measures in case of unforeseen events

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: A type of backup that only copies files that have changed since the previous backup

category_features.name: VM Backup
category_features.definition: Copying of data on a virtual machine (VM) in a VMware environment to prevent data loss

related_products.short_desc: Cybersecurity application for IT administrators to prevent data breaches, covering a suite of devices, networks, and applications.
related_products.features: ESET Endpoint Security software is a cloud-based and on-premises application for internet security and malware protection. It has a global user base that comprises businesses of every size. Cloud sandbox technology enables users to protect their mobile devices, laptops, and desktops against ransomware, zero-day attacks, and data breaches. It features file, bot, and mail protection, along with remote device management, virtualization security, firewall set-up, and web control.

related_products.short_desc: IDrive protects all your PCs, Macs, mobile devices and servers into one cloud backup account.
related_products.features:
IDrive Backup is a versatile solution that allows users to backup an unlimited number of devices into one account, including PCs, Macs, mobile devices, and servers.

IDrive offers backup plans for consumers, small businesses, and enterprises of any size, giving users peace of mind that their data is protected and recoverable at all times.

related_products.short_desc: Endpoint data loss protection and security platform that enables small businesses to manage recovery of deleted files and more.
related_products.features: Endpoint data loss protection and security platform that enables small businesses and organizations to recover lost data caused through human error, ransomware or any other online disaster, where the recovered files can be tracked through status reports.

related_products.short_desc: The most reliable and easy-to-use backup for businesses of all sizes. Now with simplified licensing and active ransomware protection
related_products.features: Acronis Cyber Backup keeps costs low and productivity high. It ensures unlimited scalability, protects any workload, and leverages any storage and/or cloud. Balancing the value of data and infrastructure costs, its uniquely intuitive web-based management console makes it easy to monitor and schedule backups while built-in AI-based technologies prevents cryptomining attacks.

related_products.short_desc: Virtual Machine Backup and Replication for Hyper-V & VMware - Try it for free for 30 days. (Freeware available for micro-businesses.)
related_products.features: Altaro VM Backup is a virtual machine backup and replication solution for Hyper-V and VMware. Designed for IT departments, IT resellers and consultants, and Managed Service Providers (MSPs), it provides robust, streamlined, enterprise-level functionality, such as WAN-Optimized Replication, CDP, Augmented Inline Deduplication and more. It is characterized by ease of use, speed, affordability  and a Lightning Fast Support Call Response Guarantee of under 30 seconds. Try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Ninja Data Protection is a secure & reliable backup solution for all Windows endpoint giving you granular control over backup targets.
related_products.features: Ninja Data Protection is a secure, reliable, cloud-first backup solution for all Windows endpoints. Ninja backup allows file-only and full image backup, granular control over backup targets, schedules, and retention plans & more. Ninja's unified backup & endpoint platform enables  IT teams to proactively manage endpoints and protect critical business data from device failure or ransomware, providing peace of mind from day one.

related_products.short_desc: With Virtual Machine Manager (VMM) you can set up and run various virtual machines, including Windows and Linux, on Synology NAS.
related_products.features: Virtual Machine Manager opens up abundant possibilities. You can set up and run various virtual machines, including Windows, Linux, and Ubuntu, on one Synology NAS. Easily allocate hardware resources such as computing power, storage space, or network interfaces among several virtual machines. Clone, restore, or create a failover of virtual machines within seconds, and rest assured that you can rollback any  failure at any time.

related_products.short_desc: Versatile backup solution designed for MSPs to offer managed backup service and earn recurring income.
related_products.features: Ahsay Cloud Backup Suite is specifically designed for Managed Service Providers, System Integrator's and IT Consulting Companies. It can empower you to offer secure managed, cloud based, and on-premises backup service to your business or end customers and earn recurring income. Supports database backup for;MS SQL, MS Exchange, Oracle, MySQL, and MariaDB. Virtual machine backup for VMware and Hyper-V, Synology and QNAP NAS devices, Android & iOS mobile devices, and Microsoft 365.

related_products.short_desc: 12,000 Customers backup with CloudAlly top-rated SaaS backup & recovery to protect all their business-critical Office 365 data on AWS
related_products.features:
Top Rated Pioneers of Cloud to Cloud Backup for Microsoft Office 365 - with 12,000 customers!

Protect your business-critical Office 365 data with CloudAllys enterprise-grade SaaS backup and point-in-time recovery for Microsoft 365 (Mail, Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks), SharePoint Online, OneDrive, and Groups/Teams. Our Office 365 SaaS backup is tailored for Office 365 administrators and security-focused IT professionals. 
CloudAlly is an OpenText Company

related_products.short_desc: Comprehensive enterprise backup solution for all workloads, combining data protection for backups, replicas, storage snapshots and CDP.
related_products.features:
Comprehensive enterprise backup solution for all workloads, combining data protection for backups, replicas, storage snapshots and CDP replicas under one control panel. 
Veeam provides backup, restore and replication for virtual machines and cloud-based workloads, as well as physical servers and workstations. VMware, Hyper-V, AWS, Azure, Windows, Linux, Nutanix AHV and Google GCP are supported. 
Veeam also delivers multiple integrations with leading storage vendors and service providers.

similar_products.short_desc: If managing backups is just one of your countless responsibilities in IT, then consider Unitrends Backup for all-in-one ease-of-use.
similar_products.features: If managing backups is just one of your countless responsibilities in IT, then consider Unitrends for all-in-one ease-of-use. Unitrends Backup Software is a prepackaged virtual appliance with fully integrated backup, replication, deduplication, archive, and instant recovery. Run it on vSphere, Hyper-V, XenServer, or deploy it as a VM within the Azure or AWS cloud. Integrate with our cloud which is purpose-built for effortless, cost-efficient backup, offsite storage, long-term retention and DRaaS

similar_products.short_desc: Qumulo is the leading file data platform for data management and storage across multi-cloud environments.
similar_products.features:
Qumulo's disruptive file data platform is defining a new category in enterprise data management, providing its customers the most advanced solution available in the market for managing and accessing file data to create new services and applications. 

We built a unified file data platform to support the entire data lifecycle with powerful data services, right out of the box. Manage, store, and build with unstructured data at massive scale, anywhere you want.

similar_products.short_desc: Rubrik simplifies backup and recovery across hybrid cloud environments. Eliminate legacy complexity by consolidating disparate hardware
similar_products.features: Rubrik is a backup and recovery solution best suited for midsized to enterprise businesses (500+ employees). Rubrik delivers instant application availability to hybrid cloud enterprises for recovery, search, cloud, and development. By using the market-leading Cloud Data Management platform, customers mobilize applications, automate protection policies, recover from Ransomware, search and analyze application data at scale on one platform. From days to seconds.

similar_products.short_desc: Spanning solutions are trusted by over 10,000 organizations to provide data protection for Microsoft 365, G Suite, and Salesforce.
similar_products.features: Spanning's cloud-native, purpose-built solutions for Microsoft 365, G Suite, and Salesforce provide powerful capabilities to protect your organization's critical data from loss - unique in enabling end-users as well as administrators to quickly find and restore data in just a few clicks. With enterprise-class security and compliance, Spanning solutions meet the rigorous requirements for listing on Microsoft AppSource, Salesforce AppExchange and the G Suite Marketplace.

similar_products.short_desc: Start running backups and restores in less than 15 minutes! Comet is a fast, secure all-in-one backup platform for IT professionals.
similar_products.features:
Start running backups and restores in less than 15 minutes! Comet is a fast, secure all-in-one backup platform for businesses and IT providers. You control your backup environment and storage destination (local, AWS, Google Cloud Storage, Azure, Backblaze, Wasabi, or other S3 storage providers).

Our backup software supports businesses across 120 countries in 12 languages. Simple, profitable pricing. No contracts. Support, updates, replication, and re-branding are all free. 30-day FREE trial!

similar_products.short_desc: Axcient x360Recover is the most reliable, flexible and cost-effective business continuity and disaster recovery solution for MSPs.
similar_products.features: Axcient x360Recover is the most reliable, flexible and cost-effective business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) solution for MSPs and the SMBs they serve.  x360Recover protects data from cyberthreats with a solution that is simple to deploy and manage. Delivered as a flexible direct-to-cloud or appliance-based deployment, x360Recover covers nearly all BDR use cases-including appliance, server, and cloud-to-cloud-and is built on Axcient's proprietary Chain-Free backup technology.

similar_products.short_desc: Effortlessly backup and restore ExchangeOnline, OneDrive, SharePoint, and Teams  including all files, folders, and document libraries.
similar_products.features: Axcient x360Cloud protects and secures Microsoft 365 and Google Workspace data by providing complete backup and restore for Exchange Online, OneDrive, SharePoint, and Teams, plus Google Drive, including Google Docs, Files, and Folders. x360Cloud supports cloud-to-cloud backup directly from Microsoft 365 or Google Workspace to the Axcient Cloud, and is HIPAA, SOC-2, and GDPR compliant. x360Cloud allows MSPs avoid the risks of being 100% dependent on Microsoft or Google for business continuity.

similar_products.short_desc: A backup solution for your Active Directory, Office 365, and on-premises Exchange environments.
similar_products.features: RecoveryManager Plus is an integrated backup and recovery solution for your Exchange Online, on-premises Exchange, and Google Workspace mailboxes. Backup and restore all items in your mailboxes, including all attachments. Export entire Exchange Online and on-premises Exchange mailboxes or just a part of it as a PST file and secure them with a password for an additional layer of security.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Continuity software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Continuity tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Continuity software helps organizations to identify threats and plan for the prevention and recovery of information assets. These applications protect key organizational data in the event of a failure and in the wake of trouble, aid the rapid restoration of system function and data access. Typically Business Continuity solutions offer options for continuous or scheduled monitoring along with a variety of real-time data recovery tools. Backup storage can be maintained locally or routed to a remote server. Business Continuity software is related to Database Management software.

related_categories.description: Data Loss Prevention software keeps corporate sensitive data secure by identifying potential data breaches and helping to eliminate them.

related_categories.description: Disk Imaging software assists organizations with creating copies, known as images, of data storage devices, such as optical disks, flash drives, SSDs, and hard drives to backup and restore disk data in cases of system failure, disk decommissioning, or forensic analysis.

Sync your data across all your devices, access files and information from anywhere, and solve your data storage problems with file sharing software. Need more help? Visit the Collaboration software, Document Management software, Content Management software, and Portal software categories.
